entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception when adding a child view to AbsoluteLayout, then removing it, and then adding it again. #12074
  • .Net MAUI clicked Button stays gray after enabling #12073
  • .NET MAUI Button stays gray after enabling on start on Android Emulator in Release configuration #12072
  • .NET MAUI Problem with ListView/CollectionView on iOS #12071
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering ListView/CollectionView on Android #12070
  • MAUI - AbsoluteLayout has 3 problems - SetLayoutBounds, Add and RaiseChild #12069
  • MAUI Windows Build - ScrollView Scrolled Event arrives too late!! #12068
  • Behavior and locals don't match execution order when debugging iOS (on remote simulator) MAUI app #12067
  • RemainingItemsThreshold not working on Windows #12066
  • Maui TabbedPage breaks in windows when navigating #12065
  • Setter showing a Build Error when using XAML OnPlatform Markup Extension #12064
  • [WinUI] Add logic to set `DefaultLabelPosition` on the WinUI CommandBar #12063
  • Can't Install MAUI tools with MS OpenJDK preinstalled #12058
  • [Android] Button Corner Radius is broken with high BorderWidth values #12056
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #12055
    Backlog
  • [Android] A big image overflow the Button #12054
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button FontAttributes not working #12053
    Backlog
  • File picker not work when publish MAUI as exe on Windows server 2019 +windows 10 #12052
  • Appshell menu item click, content page changes with glitch #12051
  • Possible Memoryleaks? #12048
    Backlog
  • Hot Reload for .NET maui #12047
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.net6 version 7.0.1..." #12046
  • iOS - Button in CollectionView footer auto expands to full width unless wrapped in another StackLayout #12045
  • Frame not working in iOS ListView #12044
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Feature Request] Windows Toolbar items Remove the 3 dots to access the toolbar item #7034
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Windows content escapes window into toolbar #11300
    Backlog
  • iOS Thickness should be multiple to 2 #11769
  • [CollectionView] Can CollectionView recycle its items (Views) rather than creating new ones? #12057
  • iOS CollectionView cell-reuse issues with Converters #9791
    Backlog
  • MAUI App UI Elements disappear on iOS when Instabug is initialized #11854

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve design type converters #12062
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    community ✨
  • Set windows placeholder vertical text alignment #12059

Merged

  • [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #11597
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Update Essentials MagnetoMeter API Docs #11933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Email API Docs #11868
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Geolocation API Docs #11924
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials FileSystem API Docs #11919
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add missing await call for color match test #11016
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [net8.0] Merge main on net8 #12050
  • [net8.0] Revert "Merge main to net8 (#12032)" #12049
  • Use a faster search when checking for item in SortedList #12041

Updated

  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    area/a11y, area/gestures
  • Added StartPath to get/set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Update Essentials FilePicker API Docs #11870
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials HapticFeedback API Docs #11930
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Map API Docs #11936
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update Essentials Geocoding Docs #11921
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️
